page.title: 11An Indian band
page.content: Roop has been living in Bilston for 15 years. He is involved in an Indian band called the "Preet Group". He plays the drums and the bongo's. It took Roop three years to learn to play the drums. There are five members in the group who's names are S.K., Saray, Tara, Rasnjit and S.L. They have been together for about a year. The Preet group were influenced by other Indian bands such as "Heera" Group,"Apma Sangeet" and "Navpreet". The group attends weddings,parties,public houses,and lots of other occasions. They are about to make their first record which they hope is a success. Roop doesn't think highly of Bilston. He has been going to school in Bilston all his life. Roop is very talented and the group will be a success in the very near future.
